product_name: CygoLite Centauri 1700 OSP Front Bike Light
long_description: Throwing a powerful 1,700 lumens of light in a compact, lightweight design, the CygoLite Centauri 1700 OSP front bike light offers smart customization to meet your nighttime riding needs.
short_description: Throwing a powerful 1,700 lumens of light in a compact, lightweight design, the CygoLite Centauri 1700 OSP front bike light offers smart customization to meet your nighttime riding needs.
